![](images/clipboard-3277243079.png)

## Getting started

Load tidyverse onto r environment by using the code chunk below.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::



## Importing data

Code chunk below uses read_csv() of reader to import REALIS2019.csv into r environment as a tibble data.frame.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis_csv <- read.csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019 <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_fat <- read_csv("data/PopData2019_fat.csv")
```
:::



## Pivoting data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_long <- popdata_fat %>%
  pivot_longer(c(3:21),
               names_to = "Age Group",
               values_to = "Population") %>%
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(popdata_long, "rds/popdata_long.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

:::



## working with dplyr



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_selected <- realis2019 %>%
  select(`Project Name`,
         `Transacted Price ($)`,
         `Unit Price ($ psm)`,
         `Property Type`)
 realis2019_selected
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 19,515 × 4
   `Project Name`    `Transacted Price ($)` `Unit Price ($ psm)` `Property Type`
   <chr>                              <dbl>                <dbl> <chr>          
 1 PEIRCE VIEW                       840000                 7434 Condominium    
 2 FLORIDA PARK                     3040000                 9737 Semi-Detached …
 3 BULLION PARK                      860000                11467 Condominium    
 4 CASTLE GREEN                     1000000                 9346 Condominium    
 5 HAPPY ESTATE                     7000000                10183 Semi-Detached …
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSIN…                2880000                12659 Terrace House  
 7 THE PANORAMA                     1510000                16064 Condominium    
 8 THE PANORAMA                      710000                16905 Condominium    
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN                 2800000                13500 Terrace House  
10 TEACHER'S HOUSIN…                2300000                 9935 Terrace House  
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_selected <- realis2019 %>%
  select(- `Address`, -`Unit Price ($ psf)`, 
         -`Nett Price($)`, -`Completion Date`, 
         -`Tenure`)
realis2019_selected
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 19,515 × 15
   `Project Name`           `No. of Units` `Area (sqm)` `Type of Area`
   <chr>                             <dbl>        <dbl> <chr>         
 1 PEIRCE VIEW                           1          113 Strata        
 2 FLORIDA PARK                          1          312 Land          
 3 BULLION PARK                          1           75 Strata        
 4 CASTLE GREEN                          1          107 Strata        
 5 HAPPY ESTATE                          1          687 Land          
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE              1          228 Land          
 7 THE PANORAMA                          1           94 Strata        
 8 THE PANORAMA                          1           42 Strata        
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN                      1          207 Land          
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE              1          232 Land          
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
# ℹ 11 more variables: `Transacted Price ($)` <dbl>,
#   `Unit Price ($ psm)` <dbl>, `Sale Date` <chr>, `Property Type` <chr>,
#   `Type of Sale` <chr>, `Purchaser Address Indicator` <chr>,
#   `Postal District` <dbl>, `Postal Sector` <dbl>, `Postal Code` <dbl>,
#   `Planning Region` <chr>, `Planning Area` <chr>
```


:::
:::



### working with filter() of dplyr



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_filtered <- realis2019_selected %>%
  filter(`Property Type` =="Condominium" |
           `Property Type`== "Apartment") %>%
  filter(`Type of Sale` == "New Sale") %>%
  filter(`Unit Price ($ psm)` <= 13000)
```
:::



### all in one



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_end <- realis2019 %>%
  select(`Project Name`,
         `Transacted Price ($)`,
         `Type of Sale`,
         `Unit Price ($ psm)`,
         `Property Type`) %>%
  filter(`Property Type` =="Condominium" |
           `Property Type`== "Apartment") %>%
  filter(`Type of Sale` == "New Sale") %>%
  filter(`Unit Price ($ psm)` <= 13000)
```
:::
